website_summaries.verdict: The Plantronics M100 is a solid midrange Bluetooth headset for the price, especially for iPhone users who may want a headset battery meter.
pros: The Plantronics M100 is a very slim and discreet headset with wind noise reduction, multipoint, and headset voice alerts
It has a comfortable fit, plus it has an iPhone battery meter
cons: The Plantronics M100 doesn't have A2DP streaming and the battery meter is exclusive to iPhones
Audio quality is not as good as we had hoped

customer_reviews.title: Can't imagine anything at this price point having this level of capability.
customer_reviews.text: Good: Pretty much same internals as Schiit Modi 3 for 20% less (name brand). Can do extremely high audio decoding levels at 32bit/768kHz. Has three different inputs. Clean sound with no issues. Here's the thing. To me, nearly all DACs sound the same. People claim they hear all these nuances and differences, calling some DACs open and airy, etc, etc.. That's all nonsense, if anything the difference is distortion levels and their ability to convert the signal without adding artifacts when it's done too slow. Bad: Can't think of any?
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Nice..
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, it plays high res audio but you have to go into the sound settings to change the hz and from 16 to 24 and 32 bits .. all you gotta do is put it in the highest ..other than that the sound is great and very small unit.. doesn't take a lot of space .. would had been even better if it had the remote .. p.s. you have to download the driver from the website .. once you do, uncompres the folder and click the install file before you plug the device .. after re-start then plug the m100
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great Dac!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on Z reviews off youtube. Got a great deal on this too. Paid $90 at the time. Shipped fast. Looks great. But what’s really important is that it does it’s job, really well. Clean, clear reproduction of the sound source. I mainly use it with spdif optical cables but I’ve tried the usb and coaxial input too. All flawless. Try listening to Neil Young’s website of free stream music in high res off the usb and be floored. Hopefully this thing last. Had it a couple of weeks now and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: abel nunez

customer_reviews.title: I love the color as odd as that may sound I chose blue.  Make me a purple one!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little box is excellent sounding and while I use it often, I also own the SMSL AD18 which I use even more often. Both offer the most excellent sound enhancement I've heard so far. I own a dozen or so other DACs in various forms and sizes and all have their qualities to enjoy, but I am so impressed w/ SMSL's latest additions to my music experience and to say least have spent majority of last 30 days just absorbed in listening to each.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The little DAC that could.
customer_reviews.text: Remarkably small and powerful, the SMSL M100 is a stylish yet subtle DAC that fits seamlessly on a desk or entertainment center. Clean and clear sound impressively supported by up to 32bit - 768kHz. An included remote for additional controls would bump this review to a perfect 5 stars, but so a simple, small form factor, and great looking DAC unit you will be hard pressed to find anything better at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Marsland

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a very good price
customer_reviews.text: First impressions are great. I'm coming from a fiio d03k dac previously. While that dac is definitely good for the price, this one is definitely better. Listened to high resolution music via Amazon music HD and the highs were more extended and the lows seemed a little deeper. I let my son play some games on his Xbox one and even they sounded better. Definitely worth the price I paid and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Putzstuck

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Can't fault it at the moment. Simply plugged in and connected a few cables - then sound flows to my amp. The display shows the bit rate , Nothing else to report. A vast step up from the Neotech unit I used before
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but expansive
customer_reviews.text: Remote and or volume control would make this way better but at the price can't really argue. It does put out a hot signal but it is a very good signal. My Xbox one x is directly connected to this with an optical audio cable. Compared with the audio from the TV optical out this thing has more depth and clarity. Just have to say though it is amazing this thing has high bit capability along with DSD.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little DAC.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to upgrade from my Fiio E17K Alpine and be able to use my Liquid Spark headphone amp properly. I have an Audinst Hud-mini, but it's not compatible with a Chromebook. (don't laugh) This little DAC just plugged in to it and works. So far it works great and the sound is pretty damn good. For the price I paid, I'm very happy with what I have.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Tomaszewski

customer_reviews.title: Driver issues!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Someone please help!! I plugged the dac into my pc and seemed to work fine, playing files with no problems. After reading reviews stating to update drivers, I downloaded, unzipped and installed them, but now my PC won't recognize the dac!!! I've tried everything, can anyone help??? I'm running windows 10. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: It played some files....
customer_reviews.text: But everything below 96khz was all distorted. I have many files above 96khz so I only gave it 2 stars. Called manufacturer and they said it was defective and to return it but offered no way to make an exchange. I now just use the line out from my laptop. Plays wonderful and was FREE...(with the purchase of a computer).
customer_reviews.author: AudioWorks

customer_reviews.title: worse product ever among the seven DAC I have
customer_reviews.text: I have 7 different DACs on PCs and Apple and compare their quality, now due to good review I try also this one This product (from China?) missing all the cables for plug in, very inconvenient, After I unlease fiberoptics, coaxial and male/female adaptor and try on it Just dead stuff no sound transmissiion also very poor instructions and print so small and cheap paper and a cheap shot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low volume
customer_reviews.text: Just turning up the volume on my receiver (an old Yamaha A/V) introduced - or revealed- some distortion. Also, when streaming the high res files from Qobuz, at 192khz vocals sounded like there was a "warble" present in every singer's voice that wasn't there at lower resolutions. So I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: informal

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Beautiful Product
customer_reviews.text: This Digital to Analog converter is simply amazing. We hooked this up and in five minutes and we were listening to beautiful music. We used the fiber-optic input and the coaxial digital input: Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Catch22STL

customer_reviews.title: SMSL M100 DAC is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Running the M100 on a Mac Mini with IMusic and Bitperfect - reproduction is very musical and very accurate. Build quality of the M100 is excellent. Set-up on a Mac is instant - no drivers necessary!
customer_reviews.author: jack_ct

customer_reviews.title: Superb Clarity Audiophile  Quality
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money , night and day , have to here for your self and will be vary impressed with the audio quality . love it . Will not regret the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Dac works great for all inputs
customer_reviews.text: I use this dac with my computer, my xbox, and my cd player. You just press the button on the front to switch input and it auto changes bitrates. The unit is smaller than I thought so make sure to check the dimensions. The dac makes my setup sound the best it has ever sounded but its my only dedicated dac so I can't comment on it compared to other dacs.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G

customer_reviews.title: Value for the price, it works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little DAC for the money. It will let you enjoy high quality music streamed or CD. The unit decodes up to 96kHz/24bit without additional software programs. To get 192kHz/24 bit I had to use 3rd party software.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Little DAC
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent upgrade from the DAC in the Fulla 2. The audio is clear and clean. Only complaint is that their are no 16 or 24 bit option be default with the drivers Windows 10 installs. Which means for discord to work I have to change the audio to 32 bit 44100. Minor gripe for such great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Good but with too many caveats
customer_reviews.text: It's a good DAC for the price... when it works. Has a lot of drop out issues with WIN 10 that other Thesycon devices seem to have, but SMSL have not updated their drivers. Voicing is fine, but tends to miss some of the lower end for whatever reason. Just get the Topping D10 instead, after owning both, the D10 is just a better device overall for not much extra!
customer_reviews.author: L.C. E.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: It has wonderful sound if you don't buy one you're nuts I've got all kinds of such equipment but this piece really blew me away you hear everything every little detail if you don't need balanced by this
customer_reviews.author: bigggy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and company!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. It produces awesome audio quality, I'm very impressed. The company is amazing as well, they personally reaches out to me to send me drivers, wow!!
customer_reviews.author: Envisionstar

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The sound of this thing is amazing, it worked right away when i plugged in on Windows 10, BUT I anyway installed the drivers and it was here when (i believe) it started to work with the xmos chip because after installing the drivers it started to deliver a really amazing sound, It totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: l like dacs
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact size, it's simple to connect and it looks good next to my amplifier.
customer_reviews.author: HOBART

customer_reviews.title: This thing is sick
customer_reviews.text: great buy for the money. I wish It would charge my phone while it was plug into it. For the money though this DAC is Sick!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to start trying out components. I was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R.

customer_reviews.title: Great DAC and fast delivery to United Arab Emirates
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the money spent. Great after sales support. Didn’t have any problems installing the driver.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: great DAC, bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: love this DAC. sounds amazing. drivers were not an issue. easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Smol DAC
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is great, pairs well with anything you throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: It just works.
customer_reviews.text: Great budget DAC with USB and optical in. Easy to use looks nice just works.
customer_reviews.author: Lothoran

customer_reviews.title: great dac for the price
customer_reviews.text: this dac i great and it has a very good quality highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: srab a.

customer_reviews.title: Simple, small, and effective
customer_reviews.text: No volume control but an excellent unit. Recommend pairing this with JDS labs atom if your looking for a big audio upgrade for little money.
customer_reviews.author: conor

product_meta.title: SMSL M100 USB DAC AK4452 DSD512 Coaxial Optical OTG 32Bit/768kHz Hifi Audio Decoder (Blue)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueSMSL M100 DAC DSD512 HiFi Preamplifier USB/Coaxial/Optical Audio Decoder Analog-to-Digital Converters 
SMSL M100 Characteristics 

♫ SMSL M100 USB DAC: Use XMOS 2nd generation USB Audio solution. Supports PCM 32bit/768kHz and native DSD512 for high dynamic range, low distortion. ♫ AK4452 CHIP HIGH POWER DAC: Built-in high-efficiency power module and lots of low-noise LDOs provides sufficient power for analog circuit. Aux power supply for phones connection. 

♫ SIMPLE TO USE: The back panel shows that the M100 decoder is purely USB powered. Support USB /Optical/Coaxial /OTG USB input; RCA output. USB Asynchronous Transmission Mode. 

♫ MINI CUTE DAC: The SMSL M100 innovates on the form factor and succeeds in producing a very small and attractive form factor. Power it on, select the input and start to use it. 

♫ LOW DISTORTION: Two ultra-low phase noise crystal for 44.1/48kHz multiple frequencies. Lots of audio grade components, include MELF resistors, NP0 capacitor, Gold-plated jacks. Low budget dac. 

Product Type : SMSL M100 

Color : Black / Blue 

Product parameters 

Input: USB /Optical/Coaxial 

Output: RCA 

USB Transmission Mode : Asynchronous Transmission 

USB Compatibility : Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Mac OS X10.6 or higher/ Linux 

THD+N : RCA output 0.0005% 

SNR : 106dB 

Dynamic Range ：114dB 

Bit depth ： 
USB: 1bit~32bit 
Optical /Coaxial: 24bit 

Sampling Rate： 
USB:44.1kHz~768kHz; DSD64、DSD128、DSD256、DSD512 
Optical/ Coaxial: 32kHz~192kHz 

Power Consumption: 1.2W 

Standby power: <0.1W 

Size : 55 x 55 x 93 mm( W x H x D) 

Weight : 258G 

Package: 
1 * SMSL M100 DAC 
1 * USB line 
1 * User's manual
feature_bullets: ♫ SMSL M100 USB DAC: XMOS 2nd generation USB Audio solution. Supports PCM signal up to 32bit/768kHz and native DSD up to DSD512.
♫ HIGH POWER DECODER: Built-in high-efficiency power module and lots of low-noise LDOs provides sufficient power for analog circuit. Aux power supply for phones connection.
♫ HIGH QUALITY DAC: The back panel shows that the M100 decoder is purely USB powered. Support USB /Optical/Coaxial /OTG USB input; RCA output. USB Asynchronous Transmission Mode.
♫ MINI CUTE DAC: The SMSL M100 innovates on the form factor and succeeds in producing a very small and attractive form factor. Power it on, select the input and start to use it.

♫ LOW DISTORTION: Two ultra-low phase noise crystal for 44.1/48kHz multiple frequencies. Lots of audio grade components, include MELF resistors, NP0 capacitor, Gold-plated jacks. Low budget dac. NOTE:The machine display has a transparent protective film, which can be torn off before use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars82 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
